pinyin: Chang2 Jiang1 hou4 lang4 tui1 qian2 lang4

definitions.Chang2 Jiang1 hou4 lang4 tui1 qian2 lang: lit. the rear waves of the Yangtze River drive on those before (idiom); fig. the new is constantly replacing the old; each new generation excels the previous; (of things) to be constantly evolving;
